resources.name: my-organization-profiles-widget
resources.description: My organization profiles widget that displays my organization profiles.

resources.name: organization-industries-widget
resources.description: Organization industries widget that displays a bar chart with the output of simplicate_crm_get_organization_totals_by_industry tool.

resources.name: organization-relation-types-widget
resources.description: Organization relation types widget that displays a pie chart with the output of simplicate_crm_get_organization_totals_by_relation_type tool.

resources.name: simplicate-organizations-widget
resources.description: Organizations widget that displays a carousel with cards with all organizations output of the simplicate_crm_get_organizations tool.
